game.title: The Dragon's Eye
game.objective: Find the Dragon's Eye and return it to the quest giver.
game.description: A powerful artifact known as the Dragon's Eye has been stolen by a group of evil doers. The quest giver needs you to retrieve it for them.

task.description: The evil doers have hidden the Dragon's Eye in their lair somewhere in the forest.

task.objective: Defeat the evil doers and retrieve the Dragon's Eye.
task.description: Once you have found the evil doers' lair, you must defeat them and retrieve the Dragon's Eye.

task.objective: Return the Dragon's Eye to the quest giver.
task.description: Once you have retrieved the Dragon's Eye, you must return it to the quest giver to complete the quest.
